Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Approximately two feet in height, this $(this.trait:breed) chicken has a $(this.trait:appearance:body) body, a pair of $(this.trait:appearance:wings) wings, and a $(this.trait:appearance:tail) tail, all covered in $(this.trait:appearance:feathers) feathers. Its head is relatively small for its size, with a $(this.trait:appearance:comb) comb centered between its $(this.trait:appearance:eyes) eyes. The bird has a $(this.trait:appearance:beak) beak below which hangs a pair of $(this.trait:appearance:wattle) wattles.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: (\{ "THIS cocks her head while making soft and small little clucking sounds.", "THIS makes tiny and soft cooing sounds in between small little clucks." \})

(\{ "THIS flops onto her side after scratching at the ground, her wings fluttering small clouds of dust over her feathers.", "THIS scratches at the ground before shimmying down low to roll and writhe in the dust." \})
(\{ "THIS raises up high on her feet, her wings stretching wide before flapping repeatedly.", "THIS stretches her wings out, the feathers fluttering audibly as she flaps." \})
(\{ "THIS stares for a moment, her head cocking one way and then the other as she blinks repeatedly.", "THIS blinks her eyes and tilts her head from side to side with a small, jerky motion." \})
(\{ "THIS stoops low to the ground, lazily pecking at the ground with her beak.", "THIS clucks and coos softly as she pecks aimlessly around the ground." \})
(\{ "THIS puffs her feathers just a bit before settling down over her feet to rest.", "THIS shimmies lower to the ground, covering her feet with her fluffed up feathers." \})

(\{ "THIS shimmies and shakes, her feathers puffing up as SHE coos and clucks with a soft sound.", "THIS ruffles her feathers before preening them back into place as she makes soft, contented clucking sounds." \})
(\{ "THIS puffs her feathers wide with an agitated squawk of displeasure.", "THIS ruffles her feathers with a series of low, muttering clucks of agitation." \})
(\{ "THIS bawks loudly, running for a brief moment with a wobbly gait and wings outstretched.", "THIS abruptly sprints for a few steps before getting distracted and coming to a halt." \})
(\{ "THIS shimmies to and fro as SHE scratches at the ground in search of food.", "THIS scratches at the ground, first with one foot and then the other with a little shimmy." \})
(\{ "THIS stretches her wings wide before squawking loudly.", "THIS lifts her head, a loud squawk emanating from deep within her chest." \})

(\{ "THIS paces around the area with a long and lazy stride, her head held high as she looks this way and that.", "THIS struts purposefully around the area, her head held high as it bobs to and fro." \})
